mapper.sql: A.id as A_id, A.user_id as A_user_id, A.module_name as A_module_name, A.operation_name as A_operation_name, A.operation_desc as A_operation_desc, A.operation_url as A_operation_url, A.ip_address as A_ip_address, A.brower_type as A_brower_type, A.termianl_type as A_termianl_type, A.operation_date as A_operation_date, A.company_id as A_company_id, A.record_status as A_record_status, A.update_count as A_update_count, A.create_date as A_create_date, A.creator_id as A_creator_id, A.update_date as A_update_date, A.updater_id as A_updater_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_operation_log A
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into sys_operation_log (user_id, module_name, operation_name, operation_desc, operation_url, ip_address, brower_type, termianl_type, operation_date, company_id, record_status, update_count, create_date, creator_id, update_date, updater_id) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{browerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termianlType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{operationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

update sys_operation_log A
A.id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
A.user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
A.module_name = #{record.moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.operation_name = #{record.operationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
